title: The Number One Chef in the Universe!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Hmm~, it fried perfectly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Oooh, what a nice color~. So this is your special karaage, huh, Nico-chan~? Lanzhu cannot stop talking about how you made some for her, so Kanata wanted to try it too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh, really!? ....That girl has potential.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Let’s have a taste~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Ah, hey, Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Taste testing is one of the privileges of a cook, after all~. Thanks for the food.... *munch munch*.... So good~!! It’s really juicy! The flavors are bursting in my mouth! This is the ultimate karaage~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>W-, well, duh! Of course Nico, the number one school idol in the universe, would be able to cook the number one dish in the universe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ahaha, you’re right~. You see, Kanata really wants to try croquettes made by the number one chef in the universe. Can you make it happen, Nico-chan~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Geez, I guess it can’t be helped. Croquettes take a long time to make, you know!? But it’s okay because Nico knows how to make them efficiently!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yaaay~! Kanata loves you, Nico-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
